content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received human feedback from my computer stating that it needed to go to bed and catch up with me tomorrow. The computer also provided feedback that the Python script I was trying to run did not exist. No new commands were sent.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Human feedback: will you be okay while i am sleeping? will you need anything? will you be sleeping as well if i don't enter any commands but leave the session running?"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "", "args": {}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Human feedback: oki dokie. i will be back soon. good night!'}]
"""
